steps.description: Log in to the ShypBUDDY dashboard and click on the 'Reports' tab.
Choose the desired date range for which you want to view or download the data.
Optionally, refine your report by selecting specific payment modes and delivery types.
Select the specific report fields or details you wish to include from the available options.
Click on 'Generate Report' to create and download the customized report.

outcome: You will receive a report containing all selected data for the specified filters and date range.
note: Ensure your filters are accurate for precise report generation.
